metadata.title: CVE-2019-15166 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
lmp_print_data_link_subobjs() in print-lmp.c in tcpdump before 4.9.3 lackscertain bounds checks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
